definitions: with reference to the inner surface or structure of something; inside

examples.text: ammunition is mounted internally in the fuselage

shortDefinitions: with reference to inner surface or structure of something

definitions: on the inside of the body

examples.text: he was bleeding internally from an ulcer

definitions: used to indicate that something occurs or comes from within an organization, country, etc.

examples.text: the party is deeply divided internally

shortDefinitions: used to indicate that something occurs or comes from within organization, country, etc.

definitions: used to indicate that something is experienced in one's mind rather than being expressed

examples.text: his voice always made me cringe internally

shortDefinitions: used to indicate that something is experienced in one's mind

definitions: using the main memory rather than a disk or tape drive
shortDefinitions: using main memory rather than disk or tape drive
